name: Birthday!
greetingText: With extremely warm hugs and lovee
wishText: May you be blessed with love and support forever :)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Amma!! I like you sooooo much!! Eeeeeven I...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something a little more
outroText: With extreme love and gratitude from Kuttu and Kanna
replayText: More than we can ever find the words to express
